tests.name: Application loads
tests.steps: Open QA FV URL in Chrome.
tests.expected: Page loads; no critical errors.

tests.name: Login page visible
tests.steps: From S1, observe screen.
tests.expected: Sign In screen with username/password and Sign In button.

tests.name: Admin login success
tests.steps: Enter admin credentials, click Sign In.
tests.expected: User is logged in (e.g. user menu / label visible).

tests.name: Admin login end-to-end
tests.steps: Open QA URL → Verify Sign In → Enter admin credentials → Sign In → Verify success.
tests.expected: Login completed; user menu shows username.

tests.name: Back to Home and Cases navigation
tests.steps: After login: Back to Home → Cases → Public Cases → Open a case by ID → Back to Private Cases.
tests.expected: Each screen loads; Private Cases title/page visible. (Requires data loaded in DB.)

tests.name: Logout / session
tests.steps: After login, use user menu to sign out (if available).
tests.expected: Return to Sign In screen; cannot access protected pages without re-login.

tests.name: Invalid login
tests.steps: Enter wrong username/password, click Sign In.
tests.expected: Error message; no login; no crash.

tests.name: Empty credentials
tests.steps: Leave username or password blank, click Sign In.
tests.expected: Validation message or clear error.

tests.name: Home navigation
tests.steps: From any inner screen, click Back to Home (or Home link).
tests.expected: Home/default landing page loads.

tests.name: Cases menu – Public
tests.steps: Login → Cases → Public Cases.
tests.expected: Public Cases list loads; case IDs visible (needs data in DB).

tests.name: Cases menu – Private
tests.steps: From Public Cases, use Back to Private Cases.
tests.expected: Private Cases page loads; title Private Cases visible.

tests.name: Open a case
tests.steps: From Cases list, click a case ID.
tests.expected: Case details (or expected view) opens.

tests.name: Page refresh after login
tests.steps: After login, refresh the page (F5).
tests.expected: Session preserved or clear re-login prompt.

tests.name: User menu opens and shows username
tests.steps: After login, click the user menu (top/header).
tests.expected: Menu opens; logged-in username visible.

tests.name: Case list – sort by column
tests.steps: On Public or Private Cases list, click a sortable column header (e.g. Case ID, Date).
tests.expected: List re-sorts; order changes as expected.

tests.name: Case detail – key fields visible
tests.steps: Open any case from the list.
tests.expected: Case ID, status, and other key fields are visible and readable.

tests.name: Private Cases menu item
tests.steps: Login → Cases → click Private Cases (or equivalent).
tests.expected: Private Cases list/page loads.

tests.name: Back from case detail to list
tests.steps: Open a case, then click Back or breadcrumb to return to list.
tests.expected: Returns to Cases list (Public or Private) without error.

tests.name: Different browsers
tests.steps: Run Smoke + P0 on Edge, Firefox (or your supported set).
tests.expected: Same behaviour as Chrome.

tests.name: Responsive / layout
tests.steps: Resize window; check login and main screens.
tests.expected: No layout break; usable.

tests.name: Keyboard / accessibility
tests.steps: Tab through login form; submit with Enter.
tests.expected: Focus and submit work.

tests.name: Session timeout
tests.steps: Leave app idle for timeout period.
tests.expected: Redirect to login; no crash.

tests.name: Multiple roles
tests.steps: If you have other roles (e.g. viewer), login and basic navigation.
tests.expected: Role-appropriate access.

tests.name: Error handling
tests.steps: Invalid URLs, network interruption (if feasible).
tests.expected: Graceful error or message.

tests.name: Case list – filter or search
tests.steps: On Cases list, use filter or search if available.
tests.expected: List filters or search results update correctly.

tests.name: Dashboard / home sections
tests.steps: After login, view Home/dashboard.
tests.expected: Expected sections or widgets load; no broken placeholders.

tests.name: No console errors on login page
tests.steps: Open login page; open browser DevTools (F12) → Console.
tests.expected: No red errors in console on load.

tests.name: User menu links
tests.steps: Open user menu; click Profile, Settings, or similar if present.
tests.expected: Correct page or panel opens; no crash.
